Me in 10 Seconds

  • Kombucha brewer under the brand ROY. Community and event organizer with Europe's first conference for commercial Kombucha makers: Kombucha Summit.
  • In the past, I co-founded hy! - a company that has grown into one of Germany's leading digital consultancies.
  • ENFP, aka an introverted extrovert.
  • Berlin.
